{{ddcl|
std::locale imbue( const std::locale&amp; loc );
}}

Sets the associated locale of the stream to {{c|loc}}. Before returning, each function, registered by {{lc|register_callback()}} is called with {{tt|imbue_event}} as a parameter. 

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|loc|new locale to associate the stream to}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The locale object associated with the stream before the operation.
